page.title: 14THE WORK OF A COALMAN
page.content: Our coalman belongs to a family of coalmen,and his sons will probably also follow him into the{family {business}. The coalman has {fewer customers} than he used to have,because fewer people burn coal in their homes.They now prefer{gas fires,or electric fires {or have central heating}.Also many areas are designated as{smokeless {zones},which means that the houses{are {not allowed}to emit smoke from their chimneys. The newer houses built in Westhoughton do not have chimneys ,so they cannot burn coal. { }
